question:
Consider the following statements about the Rashtriya Avishkar Abhiyan (RAA):
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Science and Technology
  2. It aims to adopt best practices to foster technological innovation in higher educational institutes
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. Rashtriya Avishkar Abhiyan (RAA) is an initiative under the Ministry of Human Resource Development and not under the Ministry of Science & Technology. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The RAA will target students in the age group of 6-18 years and aims to make science and mathematics interesting subjects at school levels by adopting best practices.
